MAE4339 - Teaching Algebra in Secondary.name: MAE4339 - Teaching Algebra in Secondary Schools

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: PR: Admission to Secondary Education B.S. Mathematics Education Track or Lifelong Learning Track or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Strategies for teaching algebraic thinking in middle and high school.

MAE3311 - Elementary Mathematics for Tea.name: MAE3311 - Elementary Mathematics for Teaching II

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: This course will address pedagogical content knowledge for teaching rational number concepts and operations, measurement, and algebraic reasoning.

Course Description.text: Study of course objectives for the middle grades and high school curriculum and survey of methods and materials which have special application for teaching mathematics.

Prerequisites.text: Admission to the Elementary Education B.S. - Pending, Elementary Education B.S - Education Track, Elementary Education B.S. - Lifelong Learning Track, Exceptional Student Education B.S., Early Childhood Development and Education B.S. or Early Childhood Development and Education Pending program.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: This course will address pedagogical content knowledge for teaching whole number concepts and operations, integer concepts, geometry and algebraic reasoning.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: This course provides a foundation in the pedagogical content knowledge for teaching mathematics appropriate for the middle and high school settings with an emphasis on algebra and geometry.

Course Description.text: This course addresses specific techniques for developing geometry skills beginning in the general mathematics classes of grade 6 through the high school geometry course.

MAE4383 - Teaching Secondary Mathematics.name: MAE4383 - Teaching Secondary Mathematics with Technology

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: PR: Admission to Secondary Education B.S Pending or Secondary Education B.S. Mathematics Education Track or Lifelong Learning Track or admission to Mathematics Education minor or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: The application of educational technology to mathematics instruction including graphing calculators, apps, applets, virtual manipulatives, simulations, and mathematics software.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Mathematics appropriate for the elementary school including the six basic sets of numbers, concepts, learning sequences, algorithms, problem-solving techniques, error patterns, number systems, and geometry.
